      Comma-separated list of BCC email addresses.

      Number of log events to buffer before sending an email.

      Comma-separated list of CC email addresses.

      Specifies the filter used for this appender.
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setFrom​(String from)
      Email address of the sender.
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setLayout​(Layout<? extends Serializable> layout)
      Specifies the layout used for the email message body.
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setReplyTo​(String replyTo)
      Comma-separated list of Reply-To email addresses.
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setSmtpDebug​(boolean smtpDebug)
      Enables or disables mail session debugging on STDOUT.
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setSmtpHost​(String smtpHost)
      Host name of SMTP server to send messages through.
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setSmtpPassword​(String smtpPassword)
      Password to authenticate with SMTP server.
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setSmtpPort​(int smtpPort)
      Port number of SMTP server to send messages through.
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setSmtpProtocol​(String smtpProtocol)
      Transport protocol to use for SMTP such as "smtp" or "smtps".
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setSmtpUsername​(String smtpUsername)
      Username to authenticate with SMTP server.
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setSslConfiguration​(SslConfiguration sslConfiguration)
      Specifies an SSL configuration for smtps connections.
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setSubject​(String subject)
      Subject template for the email messages.
      SmtpAppender.Builder SmtpAppender.Builder.setTo​(String to)
      Comma-separated list of recipient email addresses.
